fixed_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 173.0%/181.6%/190.3% of Attack. Inflict 1 Hell's Inferno stack on the foe, and immediately deal damage based on number of Hell's Inferno stacks on the foe. Increase this damage by 200%.
fixed_skill.name: Abyssal Flame

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 142.5/151.8/161.1% of Attack. Inflict 2 Curse stacks on the foe.
innate_skill.name: Demonic Decree

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Attack by 9.8% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Mataru IV

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 9.7% when ambushing.
innate_skill.name: Fortified Moxy IV

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 34.9%. When a foe takes a continuous damage effect, they are inflicted with Hell's Inferno, and take 7% of Attack as damage each turn for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Flame of Corruption

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 34.9%. When a foe takes a continuous damage effect, they are inflicted with Hell's Inferno, and take 8% of Attack as damage each turn for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Flame of Corruption I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 34.9%. When a foe takes a continuous damage effect, they are inflicted with Hell's Inferno, and take 9% of Attack as damage each turn for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Flame of Corruption II

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 34.9%. When a foe takes a continuous damage effect, they are inflicted with Hell's Inferno, and take 10% of Attack as damage each turn. If target has less than 50%, damage is increased by 20%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Flame of Corruption III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
